title: Contrary to What Sean Spicer Says, Taxpayer Dollars Don’t Fund Abortions Overseas
text: During a Monday press conference, White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer said , “Our intention is never to lie.” Yet moments earlier he’d offered up a claim that definitely wasn’t true: He said that President Donald Trump’s reinstatement of the Mexico City Policy (otherwise known as the...
